commit message: Ensured that an Episode publishe date is never in the future
Bumped version to next development version
Minor UI issues, clipping of the shadow on the PlayPause button
Added some indexes to the database and a integer pubDate column. Added a property to subscriptions containing the number of new episodes
Added the number of new episodes to the subscription list view
Override the default download episode setting if needed
Fixed some small date parsgin issues, and NPE mitigations
Ensured that 'created_at' is not -1 when refreshing a feed
Fixed issues where feeds with whitespace in some tags would not be trimmed
Ensured that scheduleUpdateUsingJobScheduler is only called on API level 21 and above
